div.p: In the left frame all images are listed. For editing select one of them and it will appears in the right frame.

td.stdimg: The Images page of the editor.

tr.td: The right frame contains the possibity to upload an image and lists information on the current image.

Box No. 1 contains backup options and the upload. Backup options appear if you have uploaded this image before. The timepoint of the former upload is then listed and you can go back to this timepoint by selecting it. The upload allows to select an image on your local filesystem and to send it to the PustefixEditor server.
Box No. 2 gives you information on all pages which use the current image. When selecting a page, it will be shown in the Pages page.
